title: 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor Iron Frame Mirrors Art Round Home Hanging Mirrors for Living Room/Bedroom/Bathroom/Entryway (Medium Size 15.7 inch)
descriptions:
**2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor**

Elevate your home's aesthetic with our set of two 15.7-inch Gold Circle Mirrors, a modern and artistic addition to any wall space. Each mirror is crafted with a sleek, iron frame finished in a luxurious gold hue that strikes the perfect balance between matte and bright, complementing various decor styles. Whether you're looking to add a touch of elegance to your living room, bedroom, bathroom, entryway, or office space, these mirrors are versatile enough to fit right in.

**Key Features:**

- **Contemporary Design**: Featuring a 'Circle on circles' motif, these mirrors offer a modern, stylish look that can serve as a standalone statement or be part of a larger wall art ensemble.
- **Set Includes**: Two mirrors, allowing for symmetrical arrangements or separate placements for design continuity across rooms.
- **Mirror Dimensions**: Each mirror has a total diameter of 15.7 inches with the actual mirror measuring 10 inches across, providing ample reflection and a generous decorative frame.
- **Quality Construction**: The frames are made of durable iron, ensuring that your decor will maintain its integrity and look over time.
- **High-Quality Glass**: Enjoy clear, HD imaging without warping or distortion thanks to the premium annealed glass used in each mirror.
- **Easy Installation**: A simple, single-screw hanging method means you can quickly and securely mount your mirrors without hassle.
- **Lightweight Design**: At just 2 pounds each, these mirrors are easy to handle and position exactly where you want them.
- **Versatile Styling**: Free to style them as you wish, whether it's in combination with picture walls, above your TV, alongside paintings, wall sculptures, or candle sconces.
- **Safe Packaging**: Each mirror set comes carefully packaged to ensure safe delivery to your doorstep.

Transform your space with these exquisite gold circle mirrors that offer a blend of functionality and chic design. Their timeless appeal ensures they'll be a focal point in your home for years to come. Shop now and add a touch of glamour to your walls!

**Product Title:**
2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor

**Product Description:**

Elevate your home's ambiance with this exquisite set of two Gold Circle Mirrors, designed to bring a modern and artistic touch to your living space. Each mirror, boasting a chic 'Circle on circles' design, is framed in durable iron with a luxurious gold finish that strikes the perfect balance between matte and bright. The mirrors serve not only as functional pieces but also as unique wall art that can be freely styled and combined with other decorative elements.

**Product Features:**

- **Stylish Design**: Experience the elegance of modern, novelty home decor with a unique 'Circle on circles' aesthetic.
- **Set Includes**: Two 15.7 inch diameter mirrors with a 10 inch diameter reflective surface, allowing for ample reflection and light enhancement.
- **Quality Craftsmanship**: Each mirror is framed in high-quality iron, ensuring durability and a touch of sophistication.
- **HD Imaging**: The annealed glass is of superior quality, providing high-definition imaging while preventing warping and distortion.
- **Versatile Decor**: Suitable for an array of locations including the living room, bedroom, bathroom, entryway, and office space. These mirrors can be placed above your TV, amidst paintings, or alongside wall sculptures and candle sconces for a cohesive look.
- **Easy Installation**: Hanging these mirrors is a breeze, requiring only a single screw for a secure mount.
- **Lightweight**: Each mirror weighs a mere 2lb, making them easy to handle and rearrange.
- **Package Assurance**: Delivered in a decent package designed to ensure safe arrival to your doorstep.
- **Combinability**: Whether styled independently or as part of a picture wall, these mirrors can be combined with various wall art to create a customized aesthetic.

**Dimensions:**
- Mirror with frame: 15.7 inches in diameter
- Mirror only: 10 inches in diameter

**Add a touch of glamour and sophistication to your home decor with this versatile set of Gold Circle Mirrors. Their timeless design and radiant frame make them a perfect match for various decoration styles. Shop now and transform your space with these elegant wall accents!**
